K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:176b-0: @176b shr'i gu hya garbha ta tva bi ni shtsa ya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:181b-21: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:181b-25: ston pas don dang mthun phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:181b-26: ming dang tshig tu btags nas bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:181b-27: ston min tshig la dngos po med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku @182a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-5: 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-7: srid rtsa nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-8: rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-9: gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-10: log rtog nyid las gzhan du g-yo ba ci yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-11: stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-12: dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang sgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-13: ngo mtshar sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las zhing khams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-14: gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-15: zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-16: thub pa drug gi sprul pa grangs med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-18: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182a-19: chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi @182b g-yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-2: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-4: rab tu brtan gyur aa dkar las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-5: shin tu phra ba'i aa rnams spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-6: phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-8: de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-9: spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-10: 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-11: brtan byung ye shes rgyu yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-14: tsa tsha dza dzha nya; ta tha ta dha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-24: 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-26: kun tu rab tu g-yos nas chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-28: ho:/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-29: aa ni stong dang mi stong gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-30: dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-31: thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-32: yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-33: aa nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:182b-34: ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-0: sgra yi ming gis thams cad @183a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-4: ming rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-5: sna tshogs don chen smra zhing ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-6: dngos med yi ge'i rang bzhin sems //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-10: phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-13: yi ge mgo nas ksha: la rdzogs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-15: yi ge'i dngos po yod ma yin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-17: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-27: tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-28: ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183a-29: da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-5: dha ni dra bas 'khril ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-6: na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-8: kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-9: ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-10: gha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-11: nga ni thugs gyi 'jigs byed pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-22: ya ni skye ba rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-23: wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-24: ra ni 'jigs pa dag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-25: la ni stong pa dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-26: sha ni rtag pa med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-27: sha ni ched pa'ang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-28: sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-32: a'i ni rdul snyed lha ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-33: au ni rdul snyed mi rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:183b-34: a'u ni rdul snyed byol song rnams //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:184a-4: aoo ni thams cad zhig pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:184a-6: sku gsung thugs kyi phreng bas bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:184a-8: aa ho: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:184a-11: yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:184b-0: de nas yi ge 'khor lo sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam @184b par 'phro ba 'di ched du brjod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185a-18: de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185a-21: nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-10: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi myu khyud bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-11: gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-12: kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-15: seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-16: nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-17: nyi zla padma rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-18: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-19: 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:185b-20: g-yas na mthong thos snom pa dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:186a-9: rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:186a-12: mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:186a-13: mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:186a-14: ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:186a-15: mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:190b-25: thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:190b-26: ma bskyod ma bsgul thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:190b-27: phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:190b-28: yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:190b-29: de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-2: de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-3: rgyal ba rgyal mchog de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-5: de la sogs te bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-6: phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-7: 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-8: theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-9: phyin ci log rnams thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-10: zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-11: so sor mthun par kun tu ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-12: dper na gar mkhan nyid dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-13: lus las ma bkod sna tshogs ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-14: mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-15: 'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-16: gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-17: bskyed dang spro ba'ang de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-18: mdor na bsgul bskyod thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-19: phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-20: gnas gnyis mi gnas gnas ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-21: de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-22: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-23: yan lag dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs nas phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191a-24: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-0: shin tu phra ba'i @191b dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-1: phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-2: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-3: sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-4: 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-5: snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-6: bdud rtsi lnga ni rab bsnyams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-7: rig pas thig ni gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-8: lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-9: rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-10: gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-11: bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-12: sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-14: yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-15: phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-16: bcos bu ras ni sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-17: rgyan phreng bro ba'i btung bas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-18: glu tshig bro gar rol mo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-19: sprin dpung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-21: ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-22: dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-23: zhal du gyur pa'i ma bos la; ;bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-24: las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-25: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-26: shin tu phra ba sbyangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-27: bsam yas dag la'ang de bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-28: rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-29: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:191b-30: sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-1: bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-2: mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-3: sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-4: mdzes pas bris shing spras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-6: dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-7: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-8: rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-9: glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-10: bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-11: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-12: bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-13: rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-14: lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-15: bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-16: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-17: dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-18: skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-19: rim gyis yang na gcig car du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-20: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-21: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-22: gsal ldan ma'am byin brlabs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-24: dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-25: mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192a-26: bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-0: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor @192b ma lus mnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-1: srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-2: dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-3: sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-4: phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi; ;sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-6: lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-7: gang na'ang mi gnas mi dmigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-8: mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-9: nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-10: kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-11: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-12: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-13: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-14: bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-15: rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-16: dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-17: dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-18: nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-19: nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur; ;dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-20: phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-21: rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-22: snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-23: yang na thal mor rab bsnol nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-24: phyag rgya chen po'i 'phang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-25: dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:192b-26: mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-2: dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-3: yang na lus gang tshad du ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-4: yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-5: phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-6: gos rgyan mdzes pa'i yid 'ong grogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-7: thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-8: mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-9: yang na khru ni bcu drug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-10: nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-11: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-12: sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-13: yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-14: nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-15: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-16: ma mthong rmongs pa brtan phyir tshon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-17: kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-18: lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-19: 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-20: ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-22: phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-23: byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-25: sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-26: rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-27: dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193a-28: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-0: phyogs dus dkyil @193b 'khor bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-1: mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-2: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-3: rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-4: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-5: phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-6: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-7: nye bar gyur ba'i dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-8: dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-9: rin po che dang 'byung ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-10: de dag rdzas yod ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-11: rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-12: ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-13: gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-14: thabs la brtan pa'i shes rab nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-15: de lta bu yi ngag du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-16: shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-17: thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-18: ye shes la ni ye shes rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-19: ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-20: rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-21: byin rlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-22: bya byed nus pa'i gzi byin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-23: sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-24: cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-25: yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-26: sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-27: ma nyams 'dug la rab brtson pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-28: zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:193b-29: bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-2: de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-3: sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-4: ye shes thig le nyid snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-5: bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-6: phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-7: zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-8: rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-9: 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-10: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-11: mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-12: rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-13: mthun pa'i shes rab snang ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-14: gcig dang du mar bral ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-15: mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-16: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-17: rang byung ye shes gnas med snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-18: log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-19: ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-20: thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na; ;'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-21: bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-22: stangs dbyal gnyis sam yang na lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-23: byas te dad ldan rab bzhugs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-25: skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-26: gnyer na nye bar 'byung ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194a-27: ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-0: dad med nyams na @194b phung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-2: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-3: rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-5: shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las; ;bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-6: rdo rje'i lam nas padmor bsgyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-7: rtsa nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-8: nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su; ;gsal ba thig le'i ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-9: tram gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-10: rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-11: gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-12: gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-13: gsang ba'i don nyid rtag pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-14: gzhan du smra bar bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-15: gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-16: gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-17: yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-18: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-19: aom dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:194b-20: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sku /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:200a-8: ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:200a-11: mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:200b-11: yi dvags ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:203a-0: thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer cing shin @203a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:203a-9: de nas h'um h'um h'um bhyo ae aa ra li dza dza zhes brjod pas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-002:205b-1: de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul lo //
